nodes.text: JBLX-24 was a blue- and white-plated humanoid protocol droid that was repurposed as a labor droid to work in the criminal Pyke Syndicate's spice mines on the planet Kessel during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In 10 BBY, JBLX-24 was carrying a case of kesselstone on its back through the mines when it was freed from slavery after its restraining bolt was removed during a slave revolt in the mines started by the droid L3-37.

JBLX-24 first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
